mapper.sql:
SELECT * FROM rgdb."UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho" AS "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"
"UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."gyomuCode" = 'DB' AND "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."shoriNendo" = #{shoriNendo} AND( ( "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."tsuchiNaiyoCode" = '30' AND "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."hosokuTsuki" = '10' ) OR ( "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."tsuchiNaiyoCode" = '30' AND "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."hosokuTsuki" = '08' ) OR ( "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."tsuchiNaiyoCode" ='30' AND "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."hosokuTsuki" = '06' ) OR ( "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."tsuchiNaiyoCode" = '00' AND "UeT0511NenkinTokuchoKaifuJoho"."hosokuTsuki" = '04' ))
